shortdesc.ph: Gets remote user information by passing in a user account.
Gets user information by passing in a user account.

p.codeblock: virtual int getUserInfoByUserAccount(const char* userAccount, rtc::UserInfo* userInfo) = 0;
public abstract int getUserInfoByUserAccount(String userAccount, UserInfo userInfo);

section.p: After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK obtains the user ID and user account and caches them in a mapping table, while triggering the callback on the local client. After receiving the callback, you can call this method and pass in the user account to get the user ID from the object.

After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK retrieves the user's ID and account and caches them in a mapping table, while triggering the callback on the local client. After receiving this callback, you can call the method and pass in the user account to obtain the specified user's information from the object.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Call this method after receiving the callback.
